00015 #define LCD_PORT PORTB
00016 #define LCD_DDR DDRB
00017 #define LCD_RS_PIN PB5
00018 #define LCD_EN_PIN PB4
00019 #define LCD_D4_PIN PB0
00020 #define LCD_COLS 16
00021 #define LCD_LINES 2
00022 #define LCD_MODE_4BIT
00023 #include <avr/io.h>
00024 #include "lcd.c"
00025 int main(void) {
00026         lcd_init();
00027         lcd_putstr_P(PSTR("Hello"));
00028 }
